title: Security and the law
creator_credit: Andrew Costikyan, Jon J. Conrad and Security Films
brief_description: Security officers undertake tasks similar to police and often present themselves in a similar fashion. However they do not have the legal authority of police. This film presents the American perspective on: security officer operations; differences in the types of crime (as designated by law); arrest procedures; weapons and the use of force; and incident reporting.
